channel.title: Somone help - A problem
channel.description:
Well, Some item require membership when you wield them, How do I fix this? And how can I add ::mute?
Dont spam or flame, Just post how to fix this please.

item.title: Somone help - A problem
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

My server uses returnmembers So IDK

Read full topic

item.title: Somone help - A problem
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“LeechYourStuffPlease, post:2, topic:226475”]Look-Up the item ID in your server.
It will say returnmembers = 1 something like that change it to 0
or remove the returnmembers part completely
Should be in client.java
Depending on what source your using.[/quote]
Ususally try searching “if (playerismember =” or “if(playerismember =”
Try returnmembers also though.

Read full topic
